backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with types and storage for alumni profiles, events, announcements, gallery images, activities, snapshots, and admin/approval checks.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for frontend snapshot table updates and React Query hooks with related files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for many frontend components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in theme and toaster providers.
frontend/src/components/admin/Activities: Admin panel listing activities with options to create, edit, and delete entries.
frontend/src/components/admin/ActivityEd: Dialog for creating, updating, or deleting an activity with validation and photo management.
frontend/src/components/admin/GalleryAdm: Admin interface to view, add, edit, and delete gallery images.
frontend/src/components/admin/GalleryEdi: Dialog component for creating, editing, or deleting gallery images with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/MembersAdm: Admin panel for viewing and updating member approval statuses with filtering, confirmations, and reactive queries.
frontend/src/components/AdminOnly.tsx: Renders children only for admin users, otherwise shows an access denied card or fallback.
frontend/src/components/AlumniCard.tsx: Displays a clickable alumni profile summary card with name, year, department, and location.
frontend/src/components/AlumniProfileDet: Modal dialog showing full alumni profile details including bio and contact info.
frontend/src/components/AlumniProfileFor: Form component for creating or editing an alumni profile with validation and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementAdmi: Admin panel button that opens a dialog for creating announcements.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementCard: Displays an announcement with title, date, and content inside a styled card.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementComp: Dialog for composing and publishing a new announcement with form validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer displaying branding information and the current build version.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Main site header with navigation, user menu, admin links, and mobile menu support.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Wraps pages with a header, footer, and main content layout.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Authentication button handling login, logout, and loading states using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/BackendUnavailab: Error card shown when backend is unreachable, offering a retry button.
frontend/src/components/BuildVersionLabe: Displays the current build version string.
frontend/src/components/DirectoryFilters: Filter panel for the alumni directory with search, year, and department selectors.
Admin panel allowing creation of events via an event editor dialog.
frontend/src/components/EventCard.tsx: Displays event details including date, time, location, and optional past status.
frontend/src/components/EventEditorDialo: Dialog component for creating, editing, and deleting events with form handling and mutation calls.
Protects content by requiring authentication and admin approval, handling backend status and error states.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuth.tsx: Wrapper enforcing user authentication, showing loading or sign‑in prompts when needed.
frontend/src/config/buildInfo.ts: Exports the build version string pulled from environment variables.
frontend/src/config/superAdmins.ts: Defines and checks a principal allowlist for super-admin access.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccess.ts: Aggregates authentication, approval, admin, and backend readiness into a unified access-control state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendSnapshots.t: Hooks for listing, creating, deleting, and clearing backend snapshots via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendStatus.ts: Tracks backend readiness with timeout handling and provides a retry mechanism.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendSummary.ts: Fetches backend status information once the actor and authentication are ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns current user identity, profile, and loading states derived from Internet Identity and profile query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context and logic for login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Determines admin status using super-admin allowlist and backend check via actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating alumni data, events, announcements, departments, and activities through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes used throughout the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app and wraps it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/ActivitiesPage.tsx: Displays a list of activities using useGetActivities, handling loading, errors, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for managing members, content, and events, gated by admin access checks.
frontend/src/pages/AnnouncementsPage.tsx: Shows announcements with backend readiness checks and handles loading, errors, and empty results.
frontend/src/pages/BackendPage.tsx: Admin page for viewing, creating, deleting, and clearing backend snapshots with confirmation dialogs and toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Page that loads alumni profiles with filtering, search, backend status handling, and profile detail dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Displays upcoming and past events with tabs, loading states, and backend retry handling.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Loads and displays gallery images with error handling and a fallback when no items exist.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with hero section, feature cards, and navigation buttons based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Loads and edits the authenticated user's profile with form handling, saving, and backend status checks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH color variables, extended theming, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature requirements for the alumni association app.
